compatibility.notes: LPPL-1.1 is a permissive license that allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions on the combined work.

key_requirements: Distribute complete, unmodified copies of The Program.
Check for additional conditions on individual files before distribution.
If modifying a file, ensure compliance with any additional conditions specified for that file.
license.name: LPPL-1.1
obligations: Must include the LPPL license when distributing the program.
Must not modify files that explicitly forbid modification.
Must meet any additional conditions on individual files when distributing modified versions.
